name: Farming Simulator 2011
description: The sequel to the best-selling worldwide hit "Farming Simulator" has loads of new features! Assume the role of a farmer experiencing the challenge of 18 hour days running a new farm in the middle of beautiful rolling countryside.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows XP, Vista and 7 Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel or equivalent AMD processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 6800 Series, ATI Radeon X850, S3 Chrome 430 GT or better (min 256 MB VRAM) Hard Drive: 1 GB free hard drive space Sound: Sound card

reviews.review_text: Bought a cow, watched it poop then uninstalled the game. 10/10
if youre going to get this...get mods! it makes it 10 times more fun!
Beast of a farming game everyone should get it
Don't be hatin my tractor, ♥♥♥♥♥!

Hello am 10 am from england i live in u.s i love this game it just inspires me the graphics are great Heres a good thing it lets you play.Hint:To get lots of money get a large sized trailer and a the 3rd tractor got me 130,000 And i cant get that much money on euro truck simulator now that game SUCKS! when you get crashed on a highway the sides if you turn of it stucks your truck and its hard to get money
Even though this game is old its good i love this cant wait to get 2013 titanium version.
Good game 10/10 would play again
